original_title: Shireen Abu Akleh: The Extrajudicial Killing of a Journalist
overview: In this short documentary, the Forensic Architecture research group reconstructs the death of the Palestinian-American journalist Shireen Abu Akleh. While reporting on an Israeli military raid on a refugee camp in the West Bank in May 2022, she and her colleagues came under fire, allegedly from a military convoy 200 meters away.
title: Shireen Abu Akleh: The Extrajudicial Killing of a Journalist
